sqlFull: select #fields# from predloha where stavRec <> 'smazat' and stavRec <> 'interni'
delete_query: select recordid from recordgraveyard rgy where (rgy.agenda='cz.incad.rd.Predloha') and rgy.datum>=to_date('#from#', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
delete_query_stav: select id from predloha where stavRec='smazat'
update_query: select #fields# from predloha where (zaldate>=to_date('#from#', 'yyyy-MM-dd') or edidate>=to_date('#from#', 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and stavRec <> 'smazat' and stavRec <> 'interni'
update_query_ukoly: select #fields# from predloha P, zakazka Z, ukol U where U.rzakazkauk=Z.id and (P.zaldate>=to_date('#from#', 'yyyy-MM-dd') or P.edidate>=to_date('#from#', 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and Z.rtitnkpza=P.id and P.stavRec <> 'smazat' and P.stavRec <> 'interni'
